content:
Anterior-Posterior and Dorsal-Ventral Axis Page 3
Establishment in Drosophila
Dorsal-Ventral Axis:
*Anderson, K. (1987) Dorsal-ventral embryonic pattern genes of
Drosophila.
Trends in Genet. 3, 91-97
Nusslein-Volhard, C., Lohs-Schardin, M., Sander, K., Cremer, C. (1980)
A dorso-ventral shift of embryonic primordia in a new maternal-effect
mutant of Drosophila.
Nature 2?3, A74-476
Santamaria, P., Nusslein-Volhard, C. (1983) Partial rescue of dorsal,
a maternal effect mutation affecting the dorso-ventral pattern of
the Drosophila embryo, by the injection of wild-type cytoplasm.
EMBO J. 2, 1695-1699
Steward, R., McNally, F., Schedl, P. (1984) Isolation of the dorsal
locus of Drosophila.
Nature 311, 262-265
Steward, R., Ambrosio, L., Schedl, P. (1985) Expression of the dorsal
gene. A
Cold Spring Harb. Symp. Quant. Biol. QQ, 223-228
Anderson, K., Nusslein-Volhard, C. (1984) Information for the dorsal-
ventral pattern of the Drosophila embryo is stored as maternal in RNA.
Nature 311, 223-227
Anderson, K., Bokla, L., Nusslein-Volhard, C. (1985) Establishment of
dorsal-ventral polarity in the Drosophila embryo: the induction of
polarity by the Toll gene product.
Cell 52, 791-798
Anderson, K., Jurgens, G., Nusslein-Volhard, C. (1985) Establishment
of dorsal-ventral polarity in the Drosophila embryo: genetic studies
on the role of the Toll gene product.
Cell Q2, 779-789
Hashimoto, C., Hudson, K., Anderson, K. (1988) The Toll gene of
Drosophila, required for dorsal-ventral embryonic polarity, appears
to encode a transmembrane protein.
Cell 52, 269-279
Gertulla, S., Jin, Y., Anderson, K. (1988) Zygotic expression and
activity of the Drosophila Toll gene, a gene required maternally
for embryonic dorsal-ventral pattern formation.
Genetics 119, 123-133
DeLotto, R., Spierer, P. (1986) A gene required for the specification
of dorsal-ventral pattern in Drosophila appears to encode a serine
protease.
Nature 323, 688-692
